snippet.title: Fallout: Dust - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for Fallout: Dust, a hardcore survival mod for Fallout: New Vegas. Developed by Naugrim04. 

http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/57927/?

Trailer created by Gage Allen. Original score composed by Josh Lake

*All footage taken directly in-game, no in-game modifications have been made for the trailer

Second trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PPiCVJqhniQ
